DOC.brief_summary: This registry design multicenter , single arm , open label , post-market registry study consecutive , eligible patient enrollment site . All subject undergo Endovascular Aneurysm Sealing System ( EVAS ) Nellix®-System . Subjects follow discharge discharge , per institutional standard care thereafter 5 year ( total follow-up commitment ) . This registry Nellix System , receive market authorization European Union ( Conformité Européenne , CE-certification ) `` real world '' patient population treat multicenter set provide assessment generalizability approach System . Up 300 patient diagnosed abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) consider candidate Endovascular Repair , 30 international center enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter , Observational Registry Assess Outcomes With Nellix® System Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Repair
